pkgmetadata.longdescription: A regular expressions library that does not suck. Based on <https://hackage.haskell.org/package/pcre-light pcre-light>. Takes and returns <https://hackage.haskell.org/package/stringable Stringables> everywhere. Includes a QuasiQuoter for regexps that does compile time checking. SEARCHES FOR MULTIPLE MATCHES!
